Mnemonics

Constant Mnemonic
How I like a drink, alcoholic of course, after the heavy lectures involving quantum mechanics.

Days in Month (Gregorian Calendar)

30 days hath September,
  April, June and November,
All the rest have 31,
  Excepting February alone
(And that has 28 days clear,
  With 29 in each leap year).

Graphical Set-Based Representation of Logical Operators

Fonts

Type Usage Latex Equivalents
italics without kerning and ligature rules used for variables automatically in math mode
upright roman abbreviations of operators, function names \mathrm
sans-serif and typewriter not used except sometimes for special meaning \mathtt
math blackboard bold (calligraphic) used mostly for sets \mathbb

Divisibility

  • by , last digit in a number is divisible by ,
  • by , the result of all digits summed up in a number is divisible by ,
  • by , last two digits in a number form a smaller number that has to be divisible by ,
  • by , last digit divisible by ,
  • by , number ends in
